section.p: These entries are used to record current and relevant historical vital signs for the patient. Vital Signs are a subset of Results Section, but are reported in this section to follow clinical conventions.

The differentiation between Vital Signs and Results varies by clinical context. Common examples of vital signs include temperature, height, weight, blood pressure, etc. However, some clinical contexts may alter these common vitals, for example in neonatology "height" may be replaced by "crown-to-rump" measurement.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) (C83-[DE-14-CDA-2])
SHALL contain [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.62 Vital Sign Result Value Set STATIC 1 (C154-[DE-14.03-1])

SHALL satisfy: Data Element Definitions for Results [Placeholder]
Vital Signs are a subset of Results Section, but are reported in this section to follow clinical conventions.
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
SHALL conform to CDA Organizer
SHALL conform to CCD Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32)
SHALL conform to CCD Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.35)
SHALL conform to IHE Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] @classCode = "CLUSTER" (6.3.4.21.2)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] @moodCode = "EVN" (CONF-394)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08) (6.3.4.21.6)
The observations have all been completed.

[CCD] SHALL contain [1..*] component, such that it
contains CCD Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31) (CONF-405)

[CCD] SHOULD contain [1..*] specimen, such that it
contains CDA Specimen (CONF-399)
Should be included if the specimen isn't inherent in code value.

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] id (6.3.4.21.4)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.
[HITSP] SHALL contain [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.62 Vital Sign Result Value Set STATIC 1 (C154-[DE-14.03-1])

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] effectiveTime (6.3.4.21.7)
The effective time element shall be present to indicate when the measurement was taken.

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..*] component, such that it
contains IHE Vital Sign Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) (6.3.4.21.9)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] author, such that it
contains CDA Author (6.3.4.21.8)

[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.16 ResultTypeCode STATIC. (CONF-398)
[CCD] SHALL satisfy: The specimen element SHALL NOT conflict with the specimen inherent in code (CONF-400)

[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: specimen / specimenRole / id SHOULD be set to equal a Procedure / specimen / specimenRole / id to indicate that the Results and the Procedure are referring to the same specimen. (CONF-401)

[CCD] SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more component (CONF-402)
[OCL]: not self.component->isEmpty()

[CCD] MAY satisfy: The target of one or more result organizer component relationships MAY be a procedure, to indicate the means or technique by which a result is obtained, particularly if the means or technique isn't inherent in code or if there is a need to further specialize the code value. (CONF-403)
[CCD] MAY satisfy: A result organizer component / procedure MAY be a reference to a procedure described in the Procedure section. (CONF-404)

[CCD] SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information. (CONF-406)
[OCL]: not self.informant->isEmpty() or not self.getSection().informant->isEmpty() or not self.getClinicalDocument().informant->isEmpty() or self.reference->exists(ref : cda::Reference | ref.typeCode = vocab::x_ActRelationshipExternalReference::XCRPT)

[CCD] SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information. (CONF-387)
A vital signs organizer SHALL contain one or more sources of information, as defined in section Source.
[OCL]: not self.informant->isEmpty() or not self.getSection().informant->isEmpty() or not self.getClinicalDocument().informant->isEmpty() or self.reference->exists(ref : cda::Reference | ref.typeCode = vocab::x_ActRelationshipExternalReference::XCRPT)

[IHE] SHALL satisfy: ccd::ResultOrganizer template ID (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32) is included (6.3.4.21.3)
[OCL]: self.templateId->exists(id : datatypes::II | id.root ='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32')

[HITSP] SHALL satisfy: Data Element Definitions for Results [Placeholder]
Vital Signs are a subset of Results Section, but are reported in this section to follow clinical conventions.
